title: LINKIN PARK, SLIPKNOT, SEX PISTOLS, AVENGED SEVENFOLD, And GUNS N' ROSES to Headline Rock for People 2025
description: Looks like the festival is expecting about 50,000 people. The post LINKIN PARK, SLIPKNOT, SEX PISTOLS, AVENGED SEVENFOLD, And GUNS N' ROSES to Headline Rock for People 2025 appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Isabella Ambrosio
byline: By Isabella Ambrosio Published 4 hours ago
excerpt: Looks like the festival is expecting about 50,000 people.
text: Avenged Sevenfold headlines Wednesday. Slipknot headlines Thursday. Sex Pistols headlines Friday. Linkin Park headlines Saturday. And as a bonus for Rock for People's 30th anniversary, Guns N' Roses will headline a once-off Sunday. If I don't have your attention by now, feel free to check out the lineup even further. Rock for People in the Czech Republic welcomed a record-breaking 40,000 people last year – The Prodigy, The Offspring, Bring Me The Horizon, and YUNGBLUD headlined Wednesday through Saturday – and now, they've increased Park 360's capacity to 50,000 people. Park 360 is an abandoned Soviet airfield with old bunkers repurposed as merch stands, bars, and the setting of after-hours parties. Camping is available with showers readily available and over 100 food and beverage choices (there was even a Camel cigarettes sponsored beach area – where you could buy smokes for dirt cheap). Just a bit outside of Prague, it's truly a scenic festival. While four-day tickets are no longer available, five-day options are still up for grabs, alongside some one-day tickets. You can check out what they have available here. With only a month left until Rock for People 2025 kicks off, they've made the final announcement of artists gracing their lineup. And this year is a hell of a doozy. Check out the full line-up below, and if you're snatching up a ticket – we wish your knees the very best of luck. .THEMAYREVOLUTION 6ARELYHUMAN ABBIE FALLS ADEPT AMIRA ELEKFY ANNET X & NOBODYLISTEN ARCHERS ARROWS IN ACTION AVENGED SEVENFOLD AWOLNATION BAD NERVES BATTLESNAKE BEA BEDOUIN SOUNDCLASH BERT & FRIENDS BIFFY CLYRO BLACK SONIC PEARLS BLOOMING DISCORD BRAAGAS BRANKO’S BRIDGE CAM COLE CASTLE RAT CHLOE SLATER CIRCA WAVES COCOTTE MINUTE CREEPER CROSSFAITH CRYOUT CURRENTS DAVID KOLLER DAVINA MICHELLE DAYSEEKER DEAD POET SOCIETY DEAFHEAVEN DEFECTS DIRTY HONEY DREAM STATE DUKLA DVNE DZ DEATHRAYS EAGLES OF DEATH METAL ENGLISH TEACHER EWA FARNA FAIL TOGETHER FALL FROM EVEREST FATTY M FICKLE FRIENDS FIT FOR AN AUTOPSY FLOYA FONTAINS D.C. html:
Avenged Sevenfold headlines Wednesday. Slipknot headlines Thursday. Sex Pistols headlines Friday. Linkin Park headlines Saturday. And as a bonus for Rock for People's 30th anniversary, Guns N' Roses will headline a once-off Sunday. If I don't have your attention by now, feel free to check out the lineup even further.

Rock for People in the Czech Republic welcomed a record-breaking 40,000 people last year – The Prodigy, The Offspring, Bring Me The Horizon, and YUNGBLUD headlined Wednesday through Saturday – and now, they've increased Park 360's capacity to 50,000 people.

Park 360 is an abandoned Soviet airfield with old bunkers repurposed as merch stands, bars, and the setting of after-hours parties. Camping is available with showers readily available and over 100 food and beverage choices (there was even a Camel cigarettes sponsored beach area – where you could buy smokes for dirt cheap). Just a bit outside of Prague, it's truly a scenic festival.

While four-day tickets are no longer available, five-day options are still up for grabs, alongside some one-day tickets. You can check out what they have available here.

With only a month left until Rock for People 2025 kicks off, they've made the final announcement of artists gracing their lineup. And this year is a hell of a doozy. Check out the full line-up below, and if you're snatching up a ticket – we wish your knees the very best of luck.
